structure.unit: Contributory Group General Or Blanket Insurance For Persons In The Service Of Counties, Cities, Towns And Districts, And Their Dependents

law.catch_line: Dividends, Refunds And Rate Credits To Inure To Benefit Of Governmental Unit
law.text: Any dividend or other refund or rate credit shall inure to the benefit of the governmental unit or to the governmental units participating under section eleven in proportion to the gross premiums paid by each governmental unit.
